metadata.dc:author: García-Sagredo, J M
Cabello, P
Resino, M
López-Yarto, A
San Román, C
García-Laraña, J
Ferro, M T
metadata.dc:description: We report a patient with chronic myelocytic leukaemia (CML) in blastic crisis with a del (7) (p11 p15) in addition to the Philadelphia chromosome. A potential relationship between the presence of this deletion and the therapy in chronic phase is suggested.
metadata.dc:title: Deleción (7) (p11p15): una anomalía infrecuente en la crisis blástica de la leucemia mieloide crónica.
[Deletion (7)(p11p15): an infrequent abnormality in blast crisis in chronic myeloid leukemia].
